name: @ecopages/radiant-monorepo
description: A minimalist web component library designed for simplicity and flexibility

scripts.clean: clear && bunx npkill -D -y && rm -rf bun.lock && bun install
scripts.prerelease: bun run build:all && bun run test:all
scripts.dev:playground-vite: bun run --filter playground-vite dev | tee /dev/null & bun run watch:lib
scripts.dev:playground-vite:legacy: bun run --filter playground-vite dev:legacy | tee /dev/null & bun run watch:lib | tee /dev/null
